item.title: Pembuatan web statis dengan hugo
item.description: Referensi hugo dasar: * https://www.petanikode.com/topik/hugo * https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ * https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ * https://www.opentechguides.com/how-to/article/hugo/164/hugo-site-build.html Referensi hugo dan e-commerce: * https://dev.to/couellet/blazing-fast-jamstack-e-commerce-w-hugo-forestry-netlify-4npf * https://snipcart.com/blog/hugo-tutorial-static-site-ecommerce
